text: Markas Beneta (born 8 July 1993) is a Lithuanian football player. He plays for Zagłębie Sosnowiec and the Lithuanian national team. ==External links== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Lithuanian footballers Category:Lithuanian expatriate footballers Category:Lithuania international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FK Žalgiris players Category:FK Atlantas players Category:FK Kauno Žalgiris players Category:JK Narva Trans players Category:Zagłębie Sosnowiec players Category:Meistriliiga players Category:A Lyga players Category:I liga players Category:Expatriate footballers in Estonia Category:Expatriate footballers in Poland Category:Lithuanian expatriate sportspeople in Estonia Category:Lithuanian expatriate sportspeople in Poland
title: Markas Beneta
